overview:
“Jianping Zhu has held multiple management and R&D positions for companies in the US, Canada and China. Most recently he lead an engineering team at YellowPages.com in Vancouver, Canada.

Prior to that Mr. Zhu worked for ThinkMart Technologies, Phoenix Technologies, Shanghai Yin-Xin New Technology Development Co and Shanghai Institute of Satellite Engineering where he architected solutions for various industries using cutting edge technology.

Mr. Zhu was given “The Scientific & Technological Achievement Award” by Ministry of Aerospace Industry, China, for his contribution in the design of satellite power subsystems.” (Source: Weblistic)
